name: sondersendung-001
text:
HEADER
Podcast: sondersendung
Episode: sondersendung-001
Starttime:2013-05-06 17:06:00
Endtime: 2013-05-06 19:11:00
Podcaster: Tim Pritlove @timpritlove, Claudia Krell @wortkomplex, Martin Haase @martinhaase
Shownoter: @EvitaBley, @SimonWaldherr, @luto (ADN), @Quimoniz (ADN), @Dr4k3_LE, @kaikubasta
Chat: <http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=sondersendung>

/HEADER
